repeat.docs:
Defines the number of times the code is repeated when transmitted. By default, codes are sent only once.
  * **times** ([templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable), int): The number of times to repeat the code.
  
  * **wait_time** ([templatable](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-templatable), [Time](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-time)): The time to wait between repeats (in µs as a result of a [lambda](https://esphome.io/automations/templates.html#config-lambda)).
  
  

*See also: [Remote Transmitter Actions](https://esphome.io/components/remote_transmitter.html#remote-transmitter-actions)*

transmitter_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The remote transmitter to send the remote code with. Defaults to the first one defined in the configuration.

*See also: [Remote Transmitter Actions](https://esphome.io/components/remote_transmitter.html#remote-transmitter-actions)*

address.docs:
**int**: The 16-bit address to send, see dumper output for more details.

*See also: [Remote Transmitter Actions](https://esphome.io/components/remote_transmitter.html#remote-transmitter-actions)*

id.docs:
**int**: The 24-bit ID to send. Each remote has a unique one.

*See also: [Remote Transmitter Actions](https://esphome.io/components/remote_transmitter.html#remote-transmitter-actions)*

device.docs:
**int**: The device to trigger on, see dumper output for more info.

*See also: [remote_receiver Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/remote_receiver.html#id59)*

address.docs:
**int**: The address (or subdevice) to trigger on, see dumper output for more info. Defaults to `0`.

*See also: [remote_receiver Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/remote_receiver.html#id59)*

command.docs:
**int**: The command to listen for.

*See also: [remote_receiver Binary Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/remote_receiver.html#id59)*
